urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text:
@MikeW924 Hola Mike. Is the purchase through https://t.co/wCD0fEwHFh? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@SamFincham2 Hola Sam, we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.
@vandanamalik Hola, we have responded to your comments by DM. We remain attentive to your comments, regards.

@redlionny Hello, we understand that it could be an error, however we do not see any incident reported in this regard. If you wish you can check the possibility of requesting an Upgrade at counters in advance the day of your flight, Best regards.

@redlionny Hola, we understand that with that time slot you should not have inconveniences. In any case, if during your flight you present any problem, it is important to go immediately with our colleagues at the corresponding airport to request the required assistance. Regards
@redlionny Shari, have you tried from another browser or device? In this way we should be able to discard these options. We are attentive to your answer, regards.

@saralexandra12 In this case, she must contact our baggage service center (you will find the contact number by country in the following link https://t.co/xXBAaaJ8JG) to explain her case and to be assigned a PIR number to be able to open a claim through our web form. Regards.
@saralexandra12 Hola Sara, did you get a PIR number (property irregularity report) at the airport? If so, could you provide us the details and full name by DM, please? Regards.
@kendrabroom Hola Kendra, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@GemmaWebster81 Hola Gemma, we have answered your DM. Regards.

@HugoAlb66460678 Hola Hugo, entendemos que nuestros compañeros ya han emitido una respuesta oficial a tu reclamación vía mail y en ese caso no podríamos indicarte algo diferente desde este departamento. Déjanos saber por MD en caso de cualquier duda. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@taylorcasserly Hola, we recommend you delete this tweet since it has personal information and send it to us by direct message. Regards.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @Ajdajc Hola, in this case the agency should contact through the enable channels to receive updates of your refund. Best regards.

@emmaladyrose Hola Emma, we don´t know the details about what happened. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with more details about your inquiry so we can help you. We remain at your disposal, kind regards.
@danielwales07 Daniel we are checking your DM. We will continue the conversation there.
@G_Stuart17 Hola Gary, we are sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with more details so we can help you. We remain at your disposal. Regards

@stevieee_21 Sam, in this case you should contact our colleagues from the responsible department https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t so they can help you. We are sorry we can not tell you something different from social media.
@Rooftopvegplot Thank you Wendy, we remain at your disposal for future requests.
@stevieee_21 Sam, as we told you before you should receive all the updates in a SMS or an email. We are sorry we can not tell you something different from social media.
@spanier_ranger Lamentamos no poder indicarte algo diferente desde redes. Entendemos que nuestros compañeros del departamento encargado verificaron tu caso y las opciones que habían.
@michael_sterry Hola Michael, as your last flight was operated by VY you should follow up your luggage directly with them. Kind regards.
@nys2109 Hola Nati, we have sent you more information in our conversation via direct message. Kind regards.

@bronMaya Hola Maya, please send us a DM with the details of your case, and your flight information (booking code and e-ticket number) so we can follow up on your request from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@nys2109 Hola Nati, please send us a direct message with the file number associated with your claim so we can verify more details from here. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ShulaMelamed Hola Shula. Could you provide us with the booking details through DM so that we may review your case? Regards

@spanier_ranger Hola, en este caso si al finalizar tu viaje no estas contento con la solución acreditada deberias poder apelar por medio de nuestro formulario web. Por el momento quedamos atentos a tus comentarios y disponibles para cualquier nueva duda que requieras. Saludos.

@William69471087 Hola William. Could you provide us with the number of reference generated so that we may verify your claim?
Regards
@nys2109 Hola Nati. We understand you were able to obtain a response about your glasses is that correct? When did you fill the form?

@bronMaya Hola Maya. We hope you may get better soon. We understand you communicated with our colleagues over the phone?
Regards

@HugoAlb66460678 Hola Hugo. Nuestros compañeros señalan en relación con tu caso, que te han enviado un correo brindando información referente a tu consulta. Por favor, revisa tu bandeja de spam. Quedamos a disposición. Saludos.

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text:
@danielwales07 Hola Daniel. We're sorry to read this. Could you provide us with the complaint reference number so that we may verify with the department in charge via DM?
Regards
@finkouraTh Hola, could you please give us by DM your booking information, code, ticket number, registered email and full passenger name? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@DamaniaMihir Thank you Mihir, we have replied your DM. Regards

@ANHK128 HOla, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code, full passenger name and a screenshot of the bag claim document to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@DamaniaMihir Hola Damian, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code , ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rafaelcosta_dev Hola Rafael, we have replied by DM. Regards
@VMadCap Thank you, we have replied your DM. Regards
@ISABELJACK Hola Isabella, we are sorry to read this, please share us by DM your case claim number to verify the information. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@caamilucher Hola, sentimos lo ocurrido con tu equipaje, facilítanos por DM el PIR, número de reclamación de equipaje hecho en el aeropuerto y datos personales tal cual consta en el mismo. Saludos
@Dvdb1998 Hola Denis, thank you for contacting us, it is not possible to merge or link 2 different bookings into 1. Kind regards
@VMadCap HOla, we are sorry to read this, we suggest you to delete the personal information from the public message and share us the information by DM. Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rickeard Hola Oliver, we have sent you a response through our direct message conversation. Kind regards.

@by_victoria_ Hola Victoria. Could you please, provide us with your original booking code, email address, name as it appears on the booking, and ticket numbers so that we can review them? We remain at your disposal. Regards.

@AngelaS24000243 Hello Angela, we are deeply sorry to read about that. Could you please, let us know your claim code, so that we can review it? Iberia claim codes are like this example: E20160928-01234567. Could you send it via DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa)? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@AmandaM90946822 Infelizmente, as malas ainda não foram localizadas. As buscas seguirão mesmo após o pagamento da compensação. Atenciosamente
@Nenny28 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please check
@CourtsterStrong Hola Courtney, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your full name, booking codes and ticket numbers (075...)? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@angelgortiz Muchas gracias Angel. Hemos recibido tu MD y te hemos respondido por el mismo medio. Saludos.

@AmandaM90946822 Hola Amanda, nossas sinceras desculpas. No dia 24.08 nossos colegas lhe enviaram um email. Poderia, por favor, confirmar que respondeu com as informações solicitadas? Pedimos que verifique todas as pastas, inclusive a de spam.
@angelgortiz Hola Angel, ¿nos confirmas si iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto? Si es así, envíanos un mensaje directo tu código PIR y nombre completo, por favor. Quedamos pendientes, saludos.

@Steph22881746 Hola Sephanie, sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open the PIR at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@LuisStein Hola Luis, te hemos solicitado en mensajes anteriores que nos envíes tus datos por MD para poder verificar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@JordanVickers11 Hola Jordan, could you please send us a DM with the email address and the booking code related to the voucher? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@michelleaboden Hola Michelle, please send us a DM with the email address and booking reference code related to the voucher https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@jonboyle1967 Hola Jonathan, we'll ask our colleagues to make the correction and we'll keep you posted via DM. Regards

@stevieee_21 Hola Sam, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number, registered email to verify the information? thank in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Baggage allowed on board the aircraft - Iberia
urls.description: All the information regarding baggage you can carry on Iberia flights: characteristics of carry-on and checked-in baggage.

data.text: @CamiBe90 Hola Camilla, in principle you can bring one baggage and one personal accessory to the cabin which would be under your seat, in this case you can verify all bag details through this link: https://t.co/fjV78rCevl . Any question, please let us know. Regards https://t.co/504lHjU2BE

data.text: @JulClaude Hola Claude, we have asked you for details by direct message. We will continue the conversation in that way. Kind regards.
@N_Giacchetta Hola Nicola, please send us a direct message https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with all the details about your comment so we can help you. Kind regards.
@HugoAlb66460678 Hola Hugo. Gracias por la información, hemos enviado al área correspondiente para continuar con el proceso. Apenas nos comuniquen, te informamos. Un saludo.

data.text: @TravelerIberian Hola, sorry to read this. Our website is working. Please clear the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device: https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC . In case needed, send us more details via DM https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@mschind714 Hola Michael, sorry to read about your baggage. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR reference and your full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, the first check has already been mailed. We kindly ask you to please wait for its arrival. Regarding the other two checks, please get back to us if you don't receive them after 21 days. Best regards

@angelgortiz Hola Angel. Sentimos las molestias ocasionadas por tu equipaje ¿Podrías por favor enviarnos un DM, con tu nombre completo y el Parte de Irregularidad PIR asignado para poder consultar? Quedamos atentos. Saludos,
@romaissaa_b Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@PrincessDuggan Hola, sorry for the delay. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Imad54810378 Hola Imadeddine, we've just replied your DM. Please check and provide the required information. Best regards
@DeeSeoDee Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DM. Best regards
@stephenMciner12 You're welcome, Stephen. We remain at your disposal :)
@s00nny_p Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@katefroehlich46 As instructed by email, please, contact us again if in 21 days you have not received the checks at your address. Kind regards
@CoachJonno You're welcome, Jon
@CoachJonno Hello Jon, yes you can. Please send us the booking details by DM. Thank you.

@Rooftopvegplot Hola Wendy, please send us in a DM with the details of your query and your booking code to check the available options. Kind Regards.

https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@starsurveyer We will follow your case attending your DM. Thank you.
@OliviaStam3 Hola Olivia, we are different departments and we don´t have your information here, we await for the details. Thank you.
@starsurveyer Hola, we are tracking it, we will contact you as soon as we have any updates. Regards.
@OliviaStam3 Hola Olivia, in order to help you, you must share the details of the luggage and the report with us by DM. Thank you.

@OliviaStam3 Olivia, remember that the use of Copy/paste/spam/flooding does not comply with the regulations for the use of our networks, which is why you suggest avoiding it. Likewise, our systems would not correctly filter your query, which would make assistance difficult. Regards
@OliviaStam3 Olivia, we have replied your DM requesting for all details, we suggest you to continue through that channel in order to help you. Regards

@OliviaStam3 Hola Olivia, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code, full passenger name and the bag claim document to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@chandrajin Hola Chandra, we are sorry to read this, we have replied through your FB profile, please continue through that channel. Regards

@Julia76760707 Hola Julia, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking code, ticket number, registered email and full passenger to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@chandrajin We have answered to your first tweet, Chandra. Regards

data.text: @spanier_ranger Hola. Sentimos mucho lo que nos comentas. Si podemos ayudar en algo desde aquí, por favor déjanos saber. Saludos.

@katefroehlich46 Unfortunately, the transfer is only available for european accounts. We kindly ask you to please wait and let us know in case you don't receive the checks on the next few weeks. As we can see, the first check has been mailed. We appreciate your patience

@rafaelcosta_dev You're very welcome, Rafael. We remain at your disposal 😉
@Davidharo85 Hola David. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@stephenMciner12 Sorry to read this, Stephen. Please check our new DM
